mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.office_id AS "office.id", cent.name AS "office.name", a.type AS "type", a.var_id AS "varietyInfo.id", vari.name AS "varietyInfo.name", a.min_distance AS "minDistance", a.max_distance AS "maxDistance", a.fee_charge AS "feeCharge", a.default AS "defValue", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", u.name AS "createBy.name", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate"
LEFT JOIN biz_variety_info vari ON vari.id = a.var_id LEFT JOIN sys_office cent ON cent.id = a.office_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_freight_config( id, office_id, type, var_id, min_distance, max_distance, fee_charge, default, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{office.id}, #{type}, #{varietyInfo.id}, #{minDistance}, #{maxDistance}, #{feeCharge}, #{defValue}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_freight_config SET office_id = #{office.id}, type = #{type}, var_id = #{varietyInfo.id}, min_distance = #{minDistance}, max_distance = #{maxDistance}, fee_charge = #{feeCharge}, default = #{defValue}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
